citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:20 am,
1:15 pm on 18-Apr-18.
Facility was closed when inspector arrived. Attempted to contact licensee by phone and left message. Departed
facility at 11:45 am. Returned to facility at 1:15 pm. Facility was still closed and business card was left on front
door. Attempted to contact license by phone and left message.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:20 am,
1:15 pm on 18-Apr-18.
Facility was closed when inspector arrived.  Attempted to contact licensee by phone and left message.  Departed
facility at 11:45 am.  Returned to facility at 1:15 pm.  Facility was still closed and business card was left on front
door.  Attempted to contact license by phone and left message.
